description: Demolition of single storey garage and public convenience, removal of an existing tree adjacent to No 20 Canonbury Place. Construction of a single storey dining area extension. Demolition of 1st floor rear toilet block and enlargement of ground storey for additional toilet accommodation. Removal of 1st floor partitions. (Listed Building Consent ref: P061524 also submitted).
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Full details showing adequate access and facilities for people with disabilities shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to works commencing on site, it shall then be implemented before the proposed development hereby approved has been completed and maintained thereafter to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority. 

 REASON: To ensure that the premises can be used by people with disabilities in accordance with policies EN 13 and ENV 14 of Islington's Unitary Development Plan 2002. .
